= Introduction =

Requirements forn installation of JArq.

= Details =

The project is Spring and Hibernate based, so the only requirement to deploy *JArq* is to have a _Servlet Container_ (we recommend Apache Tomcat).
All JAR dependencies are included in the distribution, under the *_lib_*`s directories. Reade the documentatio for more information about the use of this directories.
